                       int count,
                       org.apache.wicket.extensions.markup.html.repeater.util.SortParam sortParam)
Description copied from interface: UserDao
find the list of all user according to the search text(filter) and orders the list according to the sortParam

Specified by:
findAll in interface UserDao<T extends User>
Parameters:
filter - filter for username

if filter is null all the users will be added to the list

first - first item no of the user List
count - no of items needed in the user List
sortParam - used to sort the user List
Returns:
List containing the User matched the search criteriaF
